entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
